1.text_: Oh my! Tinkering with my menu already? I was going to explain this in a bit, but do you want to hear about it now?

2.text_: Do you want to hear the explanation after all?

1.text_: So impatient! Sadly, all I can let you do right now is summon.

2.text_: I can't even permit you to use any of the things you've obtained so far. So are you still sure—really sure—that you want to open the menu?

3.text_: Goodness, you're not giving Mama much of a choice here.\nThis is the Mama Menu. It's a place where I can help you with all manner of things.

start1.text_: You have a long road ahead of you, so you'll need to increase your power.

start2.text_: Hmm, where should I start? First, you need to arrange your allies in a loadout...

start3.text_: Explanations will only get us so far. Best to give it a try in practice.

start4.text_: It's mostly the same as any other game.

end2.text_: You can also enhance allies and weapons, but... Oh, never mind. You can just take a peek whenever you feel like it. Let's keep moving!
